knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

## Leaflet Map

```{r}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>% addTiles()
my_map
```


## Leaflet Map with Markers

```{r}
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat=39.2980803, lng=-76.5898801, popup="Jeff Leek's Office")
my_map
```
